title: Open Learning-Based Creative Problem-Solving Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic project management and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Collaboration-focused operation via open learning platforms accessible by smartphone, emphasizing peer experience-sharing among practitioners and social problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute at least one social problem-solving project collaboratively with peers using open learning tools
Learners can visualize and share creative ideas using various media tools (smartphone apps, online collaboration platforms, etc.)
Learners can propose and evaluate at least three innovative solutions to real-world social problems through PBL activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
